name: 2D Platformer - Zombie Defend Base Survival KIT
name_original: 2D Platformer - Zombie Defend Base Survival KIT
description:
Controls:
Use Arrow keys to move.

Space bar to shoot.

Use 1-2 to change weapons.

P to pause game.

2D Platformer - Zombie Defend Base Survival KIT is a complete fully ready-to-use unity project with complete features such as player, friendly A.I, enemy generator, barricade features, item pickups, score system, traps and much more to create your own defend the base survival game. You can download the full game source from here.
